description.author: Salesforce
text: Represents a flexipage on a record home screen
Gets the highlights panel for the flexipage
description.return: the highlights panel for the flexipage (utam-records/pageObjects/lwcHighlightsPanel)

text: Gets the tab set for the flexipage
description.return: the tab set for the flexipage (utam-lightning/pageObjects/tabset)

text: Gets the record page decorator for the flexipage
description.return: the record page decorator for the flexipage (utam-record-flexipage/pageObjects/desktopRecordPageDecorator)
